name: Dont bully orange square!
description:
Controls: WASD + space, joystick or arrow keys to move.

Made in 3 hours for TriJam.

In terms of code, used premade 2d character controller and a library with floating text and few helpful functions.

Assets used:

Art: https://kenney.nl/

Music: http://soundcloud.com/mutkanto

Character Controller: https://github.com/Matthew-J-Spencer
